description: Forecast weather API method returns upto next 14 day weather forecast and weather alert as json. It contains astronomy data, day weather forecast and hourly interval weather information for a given city.
name: weatherapi_com_forecast_weather_api

description: Forecast weather API method returns up to next 14 days of detailed weather forecast and alerts as JSON. It includes astronomy data, daily weather forecasts, hourly interval information, and is available for any location specified by latitude and longitude, city name, or other geographical identifiers. With this versatile tool, you can easily access comprehensive weather details for your needs.
name: weatherapi_com_forecast_weather_api
